mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bot_sentence_label ( label_id, process_id, label_name, conversation_count, keywords, display_keywords, display_keywords_before, special_count, used_time_s, deny_count, busy_count, score_up, score_low, crt_time, crt_user, show_name, help_detail, annotation ) VALUES
( (SELECT genTabId('bot_sentence_label') AS labelId), #{item.processId}, #{item.labelName}, #{item.conversationCount}, #{item.keywords, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.displayKeywords}, #{item.displayKeywordsBefore}, #{item.specialCount}, #{item.usedTimeS}, #{item.denyCount}, #{item.busyCount}, #{item.scoreUp}, #{item.scoreLow}, #{item.crtTime}, #{item.crtUser}, #{item.showName}, #{item.helpDetail}, #{item.annotation} )
